name: RivetFlash
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Rivet daily gives you the daily news headlines. 
These are short high level news that keep you informed of what's going on in the world.
The total length of the audio for Rivet Daily is about One minute.
